# cho-badge



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property              | Attribute              | Description                           | Type                | Default     |
| --------------------- | ---------------------- | ------------------------------------- | ------------------- | ----------- |
| `content`             | `content`              | The content of the badge.             | `number`            | `undefined` |
| `horizontalPlacement` | `horizontal-placement` | The horizontal position of the badge. | `"end" \| "start"`  | `'end'`     |
| `kind`                | `kind`                 | The kind to use.                      | `"dot" \| "simple"` | `'simple'`  |
| `max`                 | `max`                  | The maximum value of the content.     | `number`            | `99`        |
| `verticalPlacement`   | `vertical-placement`   | The vertical position of the badge.   | `"bottom" \| "top"` | `'top'`     |
| `visible`             | `visible`              | If `true`, the badge will be visible. | `boolean`           | `true`      |


## Slots

| Slot | Description                       |
| ---- | --------------------------------- |
|      | The primary content of the badge. |
